No.13491) Addendum to Policy Circular No. 10.1.28/2021 dated 30.03.2021 Sub: Technical Capacity provisions in RFP /Bidding of future   consultancy assignments for maximum works to be permitted to one Consultant- Eligibility in case of Joint Venture (JV)-reg: Ref: Policy Circular No_ 10.1.28/2021 dated 30.03.2021 In reference to the above Policy Circular dated 30.03.2021 the Joint Venture (JV) are being considered for calculation of Technical Capacity in RFP /bidding for future Consultancy Assignments. It has been observed that some consultancy firms which are not eligible to bid in individual capacity are resorting to JV formation to become eligible for participating in the bid. 2  In this connection, the following is hereby added as Note (3) below the table at para1 (i) of the above Policy Circular. "(3) In case any partner of the joint venture has its individual remaining bid capacity less than 0.5 thus making him ineligible for the current bid but, on formation of joint venture_ the remaining bid capacity becomes more than 0.5, then during the technical evalution of the bids, the bids of such JVs will be declared as non-responsive and will not be allowed to participate in the current assignment, 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: 15 ~( (Sheo Shankar Jha) Chief General Manager (Coord.)
